Definition: You will be given a news article, and your task is to classify the article to one of the four topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech'. If the article's main topic is relevant to the world, sports, business, or science/technology, correspondingly, choose that option. If you are not sure about the topic, choose the closest option. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].

Positive Examples.input: Comets, Asteroids and Planets around a Nearby Star (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - A nearby star thought to harbor comets and asteroids now appears to be home to planets, too. The presumed worlds are smaller than Jupiter and could be as tiny as Pluto, new observations suggest.
Positive Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to science(astronomy). Hence, the label is 'Sci/Tech'.

Positive Examples.input: Oil and Economy Cloud Stocks' Outlook  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Soaring crude prices plus worries  about the economy and the outlook for earnings are expected to  hang over the stock market next week during the depth of the  summer doldrums.
Positive Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to business(stock prices). Hence, the label is 'Business'.

Positive Examples.input: Russian FM meets with Katsav Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov met Monday with Israeli #39;s President Moshe Katsav as part of his first tour of the region to discuss, among other topics, a collaboration between the two countries in combating terrorism.
Positive Examples.explanation: This news article is about nation leaders meating, so the news is about "World".

Positive Examples.input: Murtagh a stickler for success Northeastern field hockey coach Cheryl Murtagh doesn't want the glare of the spotlight that shines on her to detract from a team that has been the America East champion for the past three years and has been to the NCAA tournament 13 times.
Positive Examples.explanation: The news is about a hockey, so the category is Sports.

Negative Examples.input: Kobe Bryant Rape Trial Looks Set to Go Ahead  EAGLE, Colo. (Reuters) - The trial in the Kobe Bryant rape  case looked set to go ahead later this month after the state's  highest court ruled against prosecutors on Monday over a key  piece of evidence in the high-profile case.
Negative Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to sports. The label that is provided ('Sci/Tech') is wrong and should instead be 'Sports'.

Negative Examples.input: Iraq's Al-Yawer Vows Kurd Rebel Crackdown (AP) AP - Iraq's interim president promised on Monday to prevent Kurdish rebels in northern Iraq from launching attacking into Turkey, apparently hoping to avoid a Turkish military response.
Negative Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to world issues. However, the label of the article, 'Business', is wrong. The right label is 'World'.

Pats Beat Seahawks, Extend Win Streak (AP) AP - The New England Patriots stopped a late Seattle comeback to beat the Seahawks 30-20 Sunday, running their streak to 20 wins, including playoffs. They also tied the league record with their 17th consecutive regular-season victory.
